sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SUCCUBUS, a term uſed by ſome writers for a daemon who aſſumes the shape of a woman, and as ſuch lies with a man ; in which ſenſe it ſtands oppoſed to incubus, which was a dæmon in form oſ a man, that lies with a woman. But the truth is, the ſuccubus is only a ſpecies of the nightmare. See Medicine, n⁰ 329
